content: try out this crochet coffin coaster pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/1ts7gk3rnf0 skill level easy the pattern is worked in one piece involves sewing on a design format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -dark grey and white -yarn needle -scissors final size -height is 14 cm and width is 9 5 cm
